name: Ma' Cows
description: This is a small browser game that I have been developing as a learning project.  The basic premise is that you can keep track of animals that you see on the side of the road if you are on a car trip.  This is a fun family game with up to 6 players and comes with full scoring and naming functionality, as well as a page displaying all players' scores.  this project is currently in development however updates will be coming frequently as I continue to develop the game.
